text: I have been with the clinic since my first born in 2016. All 3 of my kids still see Dr Ian.  I have nothing but praises for Dr Ian and her team. They are extremely professional and very good with kids! I highly recommend this clinic for any parents looking for consistent, long term PD care for your children.

Worrying about an infant’s health is something no parents will want to go through. First time coming here and we are impressed. Dr Ian (Ms) is very experienced and made us feel a lot better. Also the staff are all very friendly and nice. Bill (cost) is similar to other PD I believe.

Dr. Ong is very friendly and thorough in her diagnosis. The treatment and medications prescribed are usually effective for our daughter’s specific condition. Our daughter is always excited to visit the doctor to get some biscuits afterward. The nursing team is also very friendly and generous with stickers, which our daughter loves to receive. This has become our favorite pediatric clinic in Singapore.

My 3 children have been seeing Dr Ian for many years and she has been their PD since their infant stage. She is very patient, caring and always helpful.
The nurses are very friendly too and they interact with the children very well. Highly recommend this clinic.
Dr Ong and the staff at the clinic are professional and very adept to handling children. My kids have been with Dr Ong since birth and I would highly recommend the clinic to anyone looking for a PD!
